text.p: A share issue by Estiko was oversubscribed by about two times according to preliminary data, Baltic Cresco said on Friday.
Estiko, a plastics and packaging company and retailer, issued 500,000 E shares with a sale price of 40 kroons and 10-kroon face value.
Andres Ratsepp, chairman of Baltic Cresco, said about half of the issue was subscribed to by clients of Swedish Enskilda Securities.
The shares will be transfered to subscribers on May 19, Ratsepp added.
The final results will be ready at the beginning of next week, he added.
The company is traded on the free market of the Tallinn stock exchange.
Estiko has said earlier that the main reason for the issue was to finance the construction of a 12-storey business and location centre in Tartu.
